description: Multiplicity of Max{GCD[d,n!/d]} when d runs over divisors of n! (this is always a power of 2).
example: n=5, 5!=120, the set of GCD[d,120/d] values for the 16 divisors of 120 is:{1,2,1,2,1,2,1,2,2,1,2,1,2,1,2,1}. The max is 2 and it occurs 8 times, so a(5)=8.
author: _Labos Elemer_, Jun 13 2000
